CustomField.description: This field is populated by a nightly batch process and represents the total number of client scorecards associated with this account which have a Completed Date this year (based on the Current Contract Calling Start Date, whichever is later)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is populated by a nightly batch process and represents the total number of client scorecards associated with this account which have a Completed Date this year (based on the Current Contract Calling Start Date, whichever is later)
CustomField.label: Client Scorecards This Contract
